channel.title: [2006] Project FTP - continueing the journey
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/24mf68z.jpg[/img]
[center][center][b]Introduction[/b][/center] To start off I would like to inform you about some things. This project was started by Lostmyphat about a half year ago. He asked me if I could join and I did. Together with Daniel and Lostmyphat I worked on this server untill December. Lostmyphat decided to quit. Immediately after he decided to quit I knew I would continue this. It has a lot of delay because of my school work and my real life. The base we are using is Delta. Don't start to flame about this base. We worked hard on it to improve it and I think whe did a pretty good job so far. I know Delta isn't the best base out there but with some/ a lot of improvement it turns out to be quite good.
[center][b]Information[/b][/center] This project will try to re-create the RuneScape of 2006. For this moment only the F2P part is getting worked on. Once the whole F2P aspect is done we will move on to the P2P part. I am working on this project almost daily. I'm not able to do so every day. I'm busy with school and soccer. I will try to update the thread everytime an update has been made.
[center][b]The team[/b][/center]
I'm looking for some other members for the team as now I'm working alone. I'm looking for a website coder. Someone who can recreate the old runescape website and is able to add sql. I'm also looking for a client coder. For applications please send me a message. [center][b]Progress[/b][/center]
[center][b]Combat[/b][/center]
[ul][li][color=red]It's added but it's far from completed[/li][/ul]
[center][b]Magic[/b][/center]
[ul][li]All spells working[/li] [li]Teleports working[/li][/ul]
[center][b]Ranging[/b][/center]
[ul][li]It's added but far from completed[/li][/ul]
[center][b]Prayer[/b][/center]
[ul][li]Working burying bones[/li] [li]All prayers working correctly[/li][/ul]
[center][b]Runecrafting[/b][/center]
[ul][li]Single runes[/li] [li]Multiple runes[/li] [li]All runes - All locations[/li] [li]Altar changing depending on talisman/tiara[/li][/ul]
[center][b]Crafting[/b][/center]
[ul][li]Cape dying[/li] [li]Leather Crafting[/li] [li]Juwelry[/li][/ul]
[center][b]Mining[/b][/center]
[ul][li]Respawning correct[/li] [li]Level requirements[/li] [li]Mining Guild-Dwarven Mine[/li][/ul]
[center][b]Smithing[/b][/center]
[ul][li]Smelting[/li] [li]Armour making[/li][/ul]
[center][b]Fishing[/b][/center]
[ul][li]Level Requirements[/li] [li]All Fishable[/li] [li]All locations[/li] [li]Timers[/li][/ul]
[center][b]WoodCutting[/b][/center]
[ul][li]All trees[/li] [li]All locations[/li] [li]Level Requirements[/li] [li]Timers[/li][/ul]
[center][b]Media[/b][/center] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sfEhJECMRkw[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Vh4eyIUaTSE[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k7fLRWHq6bQ[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bffY1xIK6QI[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b7FyRVJ-8u4[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1EJg-PoNmG4[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XzRPmy_kvS8[/youtube]
More to come..[/center]
[b]Credits[/b]
[ul][li]Lostmyphat[/li] [li]Daniel[/li] [li]Delta[/li][/ul]

item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

neroxx:

@Halflive9: I love that you use delta <3 what server did you start with?

Thank you. Lostmyphat (blake) came up with a blank delta source wich we started coding. So we wrote a whole lot ourself. If you really want to know you should ask him.

Ontopic: Mysterious ruines changing depending if you wear a tiara or not.
Video: [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XzRPmy_kvS8[/youtube]
Note: Altar entering is only added so far with the tiara. I will add talisman entering very soon. Also busy with adding all the other altars.

Edit: Tiara “enchanting” is also done. Will post picture if you find it’s needed.

Daginith:

Awesome. Good Luck, and go through with this, and don’t give up half way!

Thank you. All f2p runes are supported. Working on the talisman, tiara use with mysterious runes to get into the temple.
And a small question:
What should be the xp rate on the server. In my opinion it don’t need to be 1x because that way you better could play runescape right? So I am thinking between 2x-5x. I would like your opinion on that.
